name: me in this populated island
description:
this man plays against his own bad spirits, which remembers him about his tragic past. He can quit the island whenever he wants, but he chooses to stay because he cant live with himself, i mean he killed his son, those balls coming arent coconuts, who said that, those are the illusions of his son coming back, because he crazy.

I've choose rock paper scisors because those are competitive games, so it was kind of ironic to play it with yourself. There is only one character present in this game and it doesnt have name.
